body: Hi! My name is SaltyCarrot and I'm a new player, I hope to play on this server for a long time, although I'm new I'm currently 4 on the weekl leader board which I think is pretty decent :) anyway, Ask Me ANYTHING!

replies.body:
Hello InsaltyCarrot!

Yes...you are really good in game.
You got decent PvP skills as well as bow skills.
It is great to have you here on Avicus.
I hope we can get to know each other a little more better!
Anyways, to the questions!

1. What is your real name?
2. What are your opinions on me?
3. What are your opinions on South Korea and Greece?
4. What is your favorite subject at school?
5. What is your favorite color?
6. Why did you choose "InSaltyCarrot" as your Minecraft username?
7. What are your opinions on Avicus?
8. What is the most spiciest food you ever had?
9. How tall are you?
10. What is your nationality?

Ok...that should be it!
I hope you enjoy your stay in Avicus.
Stay cool, and be awesome.
See you in game!
Bye!
